item.description:
Saturday at 1pm and 3pm.
Sunday at 1pm.
Reservations required. $25/person

Wine tasting, each wine deliberately paired with a mouth watering cheese and or chocolate. Open your tastes to new varieties of cheeses from around the world. learn how to pair them with different wine varieties.

This month we are featuring the best of SPAIN. Taste some delicious Spanish cheeses, condiments and the wines that compliment them.

Call or email your reservation requests to: 860-567-4045, or info@haightvineyards.com

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Spanish Wine, Cheese & Chocolate Pairing At Haight - Brown Vineyard
